resources.string:
"Since this application is still alpha and lite version, I'm so sorry if this app is not suitable with your planning. And if any problem occured in this app, please take a few minute for contact me in:

Please for your attention to give an opinion of this app.
Thanks for your attention.

Regards, 
Alexzander Purwoko Widiantoro"
"Do you want to activate 'AnyTime Converter'?'\n\nConvert AnyTime is useful to start any app features without open the app from beginning, and save your time"
"Do you want to activate 'Run as boot'?\n\nRun as boot is used to start a AnyTime Converter service while the phone finished the boot"
Enabling Convert Anytime is useful to use app features without opening app normally
Enable Convert AnyTime while phone is booting
